net.infonode.docking
Class DefaultButtonFactories

java.lang.Object
  net.infonode.docking.DefaultButtonFactories
public class DefaultButtonFactories
extends Object

Contains the default window button factories used in window tabs and TabWindow's.

Since:
IDW 1.1.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
